amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate the Navy's $9,140,000 in funding for NATO research and development and transfer the amount to the Israeli Cooperative Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer $9,140,000 from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation - Navy to Research, Development, Test and Evaluation - Defense-Wide.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
